row.process:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,100 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_EXCEL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:IF &$PLATFORM# = "WINDOWS" @echo off :ENDIF
!Normalize excel folder path :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_EXCEL_EXCEL_FOLDER"
!Normalize excel file path :SET &UC4RB_EXCEL_FILE# = "&UC4RB_EXCEL_EXCEL_FOLDER#/&UC4RB_EXCEL_EXCEL_FILE#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_EXCEL_FILE"
! Normalize vara folder path :SET &UC4RB_EXCEL_VARA_FOLDER# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_EXCEL_VARA_FOLDER#, "\", "/")
! Logging params :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_EXCEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXCEL_TO_VARA_STATIC_LOGGING_PARAMS
! Verify excel folder existed :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_EXCEL_EXCEL_FOLDER# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_DIR_EXISTS
! Verify excel file existed :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_EXCEL_FILE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_FILE_EXISTS
! Validate start_row, end_row :IF &UC4RB_EXCEL_START_ROW# < 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: The Start_row should not be smaller than 0" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_EXCEL_END_ROW# < 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: The End_row should not be smaller than 0" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_EXCEL_END_ROW# > 0 : IF &UC4RB_EXCEL_END_ROW# < &UC4RB_EXCEL_START_ROW# : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: The End_row should not be smaller than Start_row" : ENDIF :ENDIF
! Check if object is existed and is a VARA object :SET &UC4RB_CHECK_OBJECT# = GET_OBJECT_TYPE("&UC4RB_EXCEL_VARA_NAME#") :IF &UC4RB_CHECK_OBJECT# <> "20223" OR "VARA" : STOP MSG, 50, "The object is existed, but not a VARA" :ENDIF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Trim AE Username :SET &UC4RB_AE_USER# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_AE_USER#)
:IF &UC4RB_AE_USER# = "" : SET &UC4RB_AE_USER# = "&$CLIENT#/&$USER#/&$DEPARTMENT#" :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_EXCEL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXCEL_TO_VARA_STATIC
! Check return code :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : CASE "UNIX" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX : OTHER :ENDSWITCH
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
